aboutRight.aboutText: I am a skilled software and web developer with a passion for creating efficient, user-friendly applications and websites. With expertise in both front-end and back-end development, I thrive on solving complex problems and delivering high-quality solutions.

archivement.text: Hello there! My name is Sabuj. I am a application/web developer, and Im very passionate and dedicated to my work.
With 3+ years experience as a professional Web Developer, I have acquired the skills to make your project a success.

aboutRight.note: “What you envision, I bring to life through code”

experienceData.text: Hello there! My name is Sabuj. I am a web developer, and Im very passionate and dedicated to my work.

serviceData.title: Web Applications
serviceData.heading: Application developer skilled in building efficient and user-friendly solutions.
serviceData.text: As an application developer, I specialize in creating robust, user-centric applications that combine functionality and innovation to meet diverse needs.

serviceData.title: MERN STACK
serviceData.heading: Specializing in the MERN stack
serviceData.text: Specializing in the MERN stack, I excel at building dynamic, high-performance web applications with seamless user experiences

serviceData.title: .NET MVC and Core
serviceData.heading: .NET developer with expertise in crafting scalable and reliable applications.
serviceData.text: .NET developer skilled in building scalable, secure, and high-performance applications. Experienced in delivering robust backend systems and user-friendly interfaces.

serviceData.title: Python
serviceData.heading: Python developer proficient in building efficient applications and automating tasks.
serviceData.text: Python developer with expertise in building scalable, efficient applications and automating complex processes. Skilled in data analysis, machine learning, and web development.

paragraphList.text: I developed the website for Expand smERP, an ERP software company, using .NET MVC. The site is designed to provide a seamless user experience while showcasing the company's ERP solutions. It integrates with multiple APIs to enhance functionality, offering real-time data exchange and automation for businesses. The site also features a comprehensive ERP configuration system, enabling users to customize and optimize their workflows. The website serves as a dynamic platform, reflecting Expand smERP's commitment to delivering powerful, flexible ERP solutions for businesses of all sizes. You can explore the website at www.expanderp.com.

I am responsible for creating and maintaining the front end of the Expand smERP software, utilizing the powerful .NET Core framework alongside Bootstrap for responsive, mobile-friendly designs. My work involves building intuitive user interfaces that enhance the user experience, while ensuring the application’s performance and functionality remain at the highest standards. By leveraging .NET Core's robust features and Bootstrap's flexible layout system, I deliver seamless, cross-platform solutions that cater to the unique needs of users. This combination allows Expand smERP to provide a modern, scalable, and responsive ERP solution for businesses looking to optimize their operations.

I created a dynamic and responsive website for BesiteU, a digital marketing institute, using Next.js and Tailwind CSS. The site features a modern design, detailed course listings, success stories, and SEO-friendly architecture to attract and engage users effectively.
